macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US major indexes rise; S&P 500 and Dow hit record highs
items.summary: U.S. equity markets rose in the latest session with the Dow up about 0.6% and the S&P 500 up ~0.3%, each marking fresh closing highs, while the Nasdaq also climbed modestly as part of an ongoing year‑end rally.[2][3]

items.title: Dow Jones posts multi‑day gains; 30‑stock index near 48,800
items.summary: The Dow Jones industrial average continued its advance, trading near 48,800 and showing gains of roughly 0.6% in the most recent session, extending a multi‑day rally that has pushed the index higher over the last month.[1]

items.title: Micron and top tech names contributed to gains
items.summary: Chipmaker Micron Technology was among notable winners (rising about 3.8%), while other large-cap tech names including Apple and Nvidia supported the market’s advance in the latest session.[2][4]

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Record $23-27 Billion Bitcoin Options Expiry Set for December 26
items.summary: The largest Bitcoin options expiry in history, valued at $23-27 billion, is scheduled for December 26, potentially causing significant short-term volatility and price swings around key levels like $85,000 and $90,000-$100,000. Traders anticipate choppy trading during the holiday period as market makers unwind hedges.
items.source: Economic Times, U.Today, AMBCrypto, Millionero, MEXC Blog

items.title: Bitcoin Trades in Tight $85K-$92K Range Amid Holiday Thin Liquidity
items.summary: Bitcoin is consolidating between $85,000 and $92,000, with current prices around $87,000-$87,500, capped by gamma hedging and showing bearish short-term signals. Analysts predict potential tests of resistance at $90,405 and support near $82,000-$85,000 ahead of options expiry.

items.title: Bitcoin's Santa Rally Fails; 2026 Supercycle Potential Emerges
items.summary: Bitcoin's traditional year-end Santa rally has stalled near $87,440, entering a mini-Bart consolidation pattern with fading social interest and institutional dominance. Analysts see signs of a maturing market pointing to a possible supercycle in 2026 with longer rallies.

items.title: Post-Options Expiry Breakout Eyed for Bitcoin Above $90K
items.summary: After the massive December 26 options expiry, Bitcoin could see a breakout above $90,000 driven by institutional flows, positive macro sentiment, and reduced supply from miners and holders. Holiday volatility may amplify moves due to thin liquidity and tax-loss harvesting.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Gaming Tycoon Chen Tianqiao Commits $1 Billion to Brain-Inspired 'Living' AI
items.summary: Chen Tianqiao, founder of Spiking Intelligence Lab, announced a $1 billion investment in energy-efficient, spiking neural network-based AI models mimicking human brain functions, with a launch planned for February 2026. Projects like MiroMind are outperforming competitors in causal reasoning benchmarks.

items.title: QCon AI NY 2025 Warns of 'Agentic Debt' in Rapid AI Agent Adoption
items.summary: Tracy Bannon's talk at QCon AI NY 2025 highlighted risks of architectural failures from unchecked AI agent deployment, introducing 'agentic debt' from issues like permissions sprawl and lack of observability amid rising technical debt from AI complexity.

items.title: PNB Board Workshop Stresses AI as Strategic Imperative for Banking Governance
items.summary: A recent AI Leadership workshop for PNB's board emphasized boards' role in AI strategy, including data governance, risk management, and ethical oversight, with examples from ING's GenAI applications in personalization and fraud detection.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Offers Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night Free December 25-26
items.summary: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night, an exploration-focused side-scroller action RPG by Koji Igarashi, is free to keep on Epic Games Store from December 25-26, 2025. Additional December freebies like Universe for Sale are available throughout the month.

items.title: Final Fantasy XIV Patch 7.4 Notes Released Amid Holiday Maintenance
items.summary: Square Enix released Patch 7.4 notes for Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail, coinciding with Christmas maintenance and the ongoing Starlight Celebration event until December 31. Players report emergency maintenances without reimbursements.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
